document_data.name: Telvannah
document_data.mainbody: '''Telvannah''' was the [[White Worm]] high shaman in [[Vaasa]] in [[1479 DR]].{{Cite dungeon/177/Realmslore: Vaasa|79}}
document_data.Powers: Telvannah could summon the Spirit of the [[Remorhaz]], gaining great control over heat and fire.
document_data.Relationship: Telvannah was the wife of chieftain [[Tor-Rem]]. She had a [[tundra yeti]] as a spirit companion.
